mapper.sql: a.order_id AS "orderId", a.product_id AS "productId", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.order_money AS "orderMoney", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.orderIntegration AS "orderintegration", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.integration_amount AS "integrationAmount", a.state AS "state", a.freight AS "freight", a.order_count_money AS "orderCountMoney", a.deal_state AS "dealState", a.buyer_remark AS "buyerRemark", a.dealpay_type AS "dealpayType", a.receiver_address AS "receiverAddress", a.receiver_mobile AS "receiverMobile", a.receiver_name AS "receiverName", a.receiver_phone AS "receiverPhone", a.receiver_postcode AS "receiverPostcode", a.buyer_name AS "buyerName", a.buy_userid AS "buyUserid", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.recvfee_time AS "recvfeeTime", a.recv_username AS "recvUsername", a.freight_company AS "freightCompany", a.freight_number AS "freightNumber", a.express_code AS "expressCode", a.channel_balance AS "channelBalance", a.return_balance AS "returnBalance", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_order
